title: Jupiter Transit in the 2nd House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Jupiter transiting your second house expands focus on values, wealth, and speech. Financial outlook becomes optimistic, with opportunities to grow resources through ethical choices and steady planning. Words carry wisdom and authority, influencing family matters and negotiations. There is a stronger sense of self-worth tied to principles rather than impulse. When guided consciously, this transit supports sustainable wealth creation, refined communication, and alignment between income and long-term values.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Stronger sense of self-worth and values.

closing: Jupiter in the 2nd house strengthens wealth and values together. When growth is guided by ethics and moderation, security deepens naturally.
